header.title: Abhinav Gola
header.description: Final year student at ESSEC Business School, eager to transition into roles within Investment Banking, M&A, Asset, or Wealth Management

about.title: About me
about.description: I am a final year business student at ESSEC Business School, Paris, currently leveraging my analytical prowess as a Credit Risk Analyst in the Private Banking division at Société Générale. My professional journey includes a solid foundation in programming languages and significant experience in the dynamic fields of Data and AI.

unrc.title: ESSEC Business School, Cergy
unrc.description: I finished first year as a regular (condition) student in the subjects of Logic, Introduction to Algorithms and Introduction to Algebra. (3/4). I still opted for dropping out because it wasn't fully what I expected it to be.

itec.title: National Institute of Technological, Delhi
itec.description: I enjoy this academic experience a lot more. I'm also part of the iTec Lab Team, an institute initiative to insert students into the professional world.

escuchaActiva.title: Credit Risk Analyst Apprentice
escuchaActiva.description: As mentioned above, I worked as a member of the iTec Lab Team in the front-end development of a webinar platform. I believe I successfully achieved the mock up design in an optimal and fully responsive way. I had no inconvenients that I couldn't resolve by my own means.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: These are some of the technologies/frameworks that I work with. The percentages aren't fully representative.
